verses.name: Luke 11:35
verses.text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness.

verses.name: Luke 11:36
verses.text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light, having no part dark, the whole shall be full of light, as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light.

verses.name: Luke 11:37
verses.text: And as he spake, a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him: and he went in, and sat down to meat.

verses.name: Luke 11:38
verses.text: And when the Pharisee saw it, he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner.
